data.meta_description: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE BOARD OF DIRECTORS Thomas Spannagl (Chairman) Since June 2015 Mr. Thomas Spannagl has been Managing Director of the SCHWENK Building Materials Group, headquartered in Ulm, Germany.
